FuncDef: The reset service-security counters command clears statistics about an MPAC policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MPAC policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces and must start with a letter.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When excessive MPAC policy statistics are stored or new statistics are queried, you can run the reset service-security counters command to clear the existing statistics.
To clear statistics about a specified IPv4 or IPv6 MPAC policy, specify the security-policy-name parameter. To clear statistics about all MPAC policies, do not specify the security-policy-name parameter.
Precautions
After the reset service-security counters command is run, the original statistics are cleared and cannot be displayed.
